title: QA Tester (AI Model & Functional Focus)
article: OverviewWe are seeking a QA Tester with a strong emphasis on data and functional testing to join our AI software development team. You'll play a crucial role in ensuring the quality and reliability of our AI-driven products, focusing on data integrity, functional correctness, and user acceptance.Job Descriptionâ—Â  Â  Â  Â Collect and maintain evaluation data based on the created test plans and test cases.â—Â  Â  Â  Verify the integrity and accuracy of input and output data used by AI models within the testing applications and virtual environments.â—Â  Â  Â  Â Develop and execute test cases to verify the functionality of AI software features and components.â—Â  Â  Â  Â Work with machine learning engineers to make sure that functional & non-functional requirements are addressed.â—Â  Â  Â  Â Document and report status on manual and automated test cases for functional and non-functional requirements.Basic Requirementsâ—Â  Â  Â  Â Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.â—Â  Â  Â  Â Ability to configure and utilize virtual environments for testing purposes.â—Â  Â  Â  Â Ability to analyze and validate data for testing AI models.â—Â  Â  Â  Â Experience designing and executing functional test cases.â—Â  Â  Â  Â Comfortable working in Linux environments and basic understanding of network and hardware systems.â—Â  Â  Â  Â Proficient in MS Office, Google Sheets, for data analysis and reporting.â—Â  Â  Â  Â Ability to read and write in English to understand technical documentation and write reports.â—Â  Â  Â  Â Being great at listening, participating, and expressing ideas.â—Â  Â  Â  Â Have at least 1-2 years of experience in the AI â€‹â€‹field (In any position).Benefitsâ—Â  Â  Â  Â Competitive salary and benefits package.â—Â  Â  Â  Â Opportunity to work on cutting-edge AI technology.â—Â  Â  Â  Â Collaborative and innovative work environment.â—Â  Â  Â  Â Mentorship and training for candidates with less experience in AI testing.Contact: tháº§y LÃ½ Quá»‘c Ngá»cÂ (mail: lqngoc@fit.hcmus.edu.vn, mobile: 0854554096)Â

title: [Communication support] Bach Khoa Innovation 2024
article: Bach Khoa Innovation (BKI) is an annual innovation startup competition organized by Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology since 2018. The key target audience is students from schools and universities in Ho Chi Minh City and surrounding areas. In 2024, BKI aims to expand its target audience to start-up groups and students from universities nationally and internationally while upgrading the award structure and support package to groups after the competition.Bach Khoa Innovation provides a creative space based on high-tech science and technology combined with a practical business model, helping young people apply learned knowledge to solve technical and economic problems for businesses and society as well as have the opportunity to realize their startup ideas.Deadline has been extended to June 23rd, 2024.For detailed information, please refer to https://bk-innovation.hcmut.edu.vn/

title: Junior DevOps Engineer (Golang)
article: Our CompanyBioTuring is an innovative bioinformatics company based in San Diego, USA. Founded in 2016, the company has developed transformational bioinformatics platforms for sequencing data analysis, enabling scientists to gain valuable insights from biological data in an interactive, fast, and accurate approach. BioTuring helps accelerate life sciences and nourishes computational minds.Role DescriptionWe are seeking a talented Junior DevOps Engineer (GO) to join our team and play a critical rolein developing and maintaining robust software applications.Key ResponsibilitiesDevelop clean, maintainable, and efficient code using Golang, adhering to best practices and leveraging concurrency features effectively.Utilize Linux and Docker effectively to manage dependencies, containerize applications, and ensure smooth deployments.Design and implement software solutions with a solid understanding of software architecture principles (e.g., scalability, modularity).Collaborate effectively with developers and other stakeholders to understand requirements and deliver solutions.Solid knowledge of algorithms and data structures.Requirements2+ years of proven experience building software applications with GolangSolid understanding of Linux system administration and command line toolsProficiency with Docker and containerization concepts.Experience with software design principles and a passion for creating maintainable and scalable solutionsExcellent communication and collaboration skillsProblem-solving skills and a commitment to delivering high-quality codePreferably if youHad experience in DevOps / Data Engineer positionHad experience working with SQL / Elasticsearch / Object Storage in go.We OfferCompetitive salary and benefits package.Lunch prepared by the Company.Flexible working hours.A collaborative and supportive work environment.A chance to learn and grow your career in a rapidly evolving field.Insurance benefit (Bao Viet Insurance) for employees after 1 year and above of employment.

title: FRONTEND DEVELOPER - REACTJS ( FRESHER)
article:
POSITION DETAILS:

Position: Frontend
Developer-ReactJS (Fresher)
Location:Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  HCM:
Nguyen Lam Tower, 133 Duong Ba Trac Street, Ward 1, District 8.Da Nang: 88 Tran Van Du Street, Ngu Hanh Son
District.
Work type: Full-time

COMPANY BRIEF INTRODUCTION:

JourneyHorizonÂ is an
active Australian/Vietnamese software development company in Ho Chi Minh City
that serves and delivers projects across the globe. We value our staff and
their personal development above everything else. Making them successful is one
of our top priorities.
We know
that every great journey starts with a single step and we are here to be with
you from that very first step. We are looking for young and talented Frontend Developer - ReactJS (Fresher)
to join our team, who live and breathe our core values:


Help others be
successfulTake pride in
the work you produceDeliver on your
commitments - â€œdo what you say you will doâ€

WHAT YOU WILL DO:




Be a part of the
Journey Horizon family.Learn how to
create clean, beautiful, and easy-to-maintain code.Work on web
projects and mobile applications with state-of-the-art technology stack.

RESPONSIBILITIES:


WE LOOKING FOR POTENTIAL CANDIDATE WITH:4th-year student or fresh graduate in Information Technology/ Computer Sciences;Good command of foundation algorithm;Good understanding of data structure;Understanding about OOP;Great efficiency in written and spoken English;Can work full time stably.

LOVE IF YOU HAVEKnowing Figma, Photoshop, Sketch or Adobe XD design is a huge plus.

BENEFITS:
For
Fresher:Allowance the training process for Freshers;Standard training program, methodically designed;100% can become official employee after completing
the Fresher training course at the company;Review performance and salary after finishing the training;Can choose to work in HCM or Da Nang;

For Employee:12 days Annual leave and 2 days sick leave;1 day off for your birthday;1 day off for Australian Day;Female Employee Benefits about menstrual cramps;Performance review 2 times/ year, bonus depends on
the financial status of the organizationFlexible working hours;Essential working equipment will be provided;Free snacks & drinks;Private health insurance.
To apply for this position, please send your CV to
email:[FE-Fresher]_Full name_Location apply careers@journeyh.io or simply submit your CV directly
through our website https://www.journeyh.io/career/.
For more information:
â—Â Â Our Website: https://www.journeyh.io/
â—Â  Â Email: careers@journeyh.io
Thank you! We appreciate your time and look forward to hearing
from you.

title: BOUYGUES CONSTRUCTION IT VIETNAM -  Hiring Network/ System Interns for IT Supervision Level 1
article:
Bouygues Construction IT VietnamÂ is a part
ofÂ Bouygues Construction IT, a trusted partner for the business
lines which provides competitiveness of theÂ Bouygues Construction GroupÂ and
promotes its digital transformation.As an IT Supervision Level 1, you will work with our amazing
teams in Vietnam and Morocco to ensure the system operation of Bouygues
Construction Group.Internship information:
Program
     length: 6 months
Training
     hour: Monday â€“ Friday, 08:45 AM â€“ 06:15 PM
Location:
     Etown building, 364 Cong Hoa, Ward 13, Tan Binh District, HCMC
Allowance:
     6,600,000 VND Gross/ month
Your key responsibilities will be:
Perform
     applications daily check before business hours of headquarter.
Escalate
     issues to appropriate level 2.
Generate
     and provide regular SCOM reporting.
Perform
     regular backup incidents following procedures.
Follow
     up procedures and propose improvements if needed.
End-users
     support.
Network
     checks (POM).
Weekly
     report to manager.
JOB REQUIREMENTS
Graduated
     with bachelor in either Information Technology, Computer Science or
     related degree and have good background in IT.
Fluent
     in English. French is a big plus.
Experience/
     Solid knowledge in the installation and administration of Microsoft System
     Center Operations Manager is appreciable.
Experience/
     Solid knowledge in Server Administrator on Windows Server is a big plus.
Experience
     with ITSM ticketing system.
Available
     to work at night shift.
General Skills
Motivated,
     eager to learn.
Good
     communication.
Strict
     and methodic.
Well-organized.
Cares
     about delivery quality.
Team
     spirit and autonomy.
OUR BENEFITSProfessional, Open-minded and Creative Environment:
International
     workplace with great teamwork and Agile mindset.
Strong
     sharing culture to improve individual development.
Individual Development
Individual
     career and development plan.
Various
     knowledge sharing and training in online internal learning hub.
Special Care for You
Competitive
     allowance on internship period.
Compulsory
     insurance and additional medical insurance.
1
     leave day/ month.
Parking
     fee.
Internal
     company activities.Apply your CV to us via: hr.bycnitvn@bouygues-construction.com or call: +84 352 434 305.

title: Software Engineer (Back End)
article: Our CompanyBioTuring is an innovative bioinformatics company based in San Diego. Founded in 2016, the company has developed transformational bioinformatics platforms for sequencing data analysis, enabling scientists to gain valuable insights from biological data in an interactive, fast, and accurate approach. BioTuring helps accelerate life sciences and nourishes computational minds.Role DescriptionIn this critical role, you'll play a pivotal role in building and maintaining the robust backend infrastructure that powers our innovative bioinformatics platform. You'll collaborate with a team of passionate scientists and software engineers who are constantly innovating to elevate the user experience. Working within this dynamic environment, you'll leverage your technical expertise, analytical mind, and insatiable curiosity to make a significant impact on BioTuring's success and empower the achievements of our clients.Key ResponsibilitiesWork and collaborate with a top-notch team of scientists, bioinformaticians, biomedical researches, software engineers, system engineers to design, develop, and maintain back-end and front-end systems for data intensive applications.Implement efficient algorithms and data structures to process and analyze large-scale biological data sets.Optimize data storage and retrieval mechanisms for high-performance computing.Troubleshoot and debug complex software issues, ensuring the reliability and accuracy of bioinformatics pipelines.Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in bioinformatics and computational biology to contribute innovative solutions to our projects.RequirementsBachelor, Master, or PhD degree in Computer Science, Bioinformatics, or a related field.Proven experience as a Back-End Developer, preferably in a bioinformatics or genomics-focused role.Strong knowledge of data structures, algorithms, and software architecture.Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, Go, NodeJS, or C++.Experience with building and maintaining scalable, high-performance backend systems suitable for handling large datasets.Familiarity with bioinformatics tools and libraries is a plus.Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently and in a team.A passion for bioinformatics and a desire to contribute to scientific progress.Ability to thrive in an ambiguous environment, embracing the challenge of building something truly innovative.Passion for joining a startup environment where autonomy, a love of learning, and excitement for engineering biology are valued over rigid processes and egos.Strong communication and collaboration skills.We OfferCompetitive salary and benefits package.Lunch prepared by the Company.Flexible working hours.A collaborative and supportive work environment.A chance to learn and grow your career in a rapidly evolving field.Insurance benefit (Bao Viet Insurance) for employees after 1 year and above of employment.
